sentences.en: "If you know what to say and how to say it, you can speak up and keep the risk of retaliation to a minimum, " he said.
sentences.cn: 他说：”如果你知道说什么、如何说，你就能为自己讨回公道，并将被报复的风险降至最低“。

sentences.en: But the White House has a stronger motive than retaliation.
sentences.cn: 尽管如此,白宫萌生了更强烈的动机,远非只是报复.

sentences.en: Community and church leaders have appealed for calm and no retaliation.
sentences.cn: 社区和教会领袖呼吁各方保持冷静,不要采取报复行动.

sentences.en: Executioners and judges have worn masks to avoid retaliation.
sentences.cn: 死刑执行者及审判官也穿戴面具,预防被罪犯报复.

sentences.en: He endured hardships to plan retaliation.
He never said a single word in retaliation.
sentences.cn: 他从未说过一句反击的话.

sentences.en: I'd be glad of a retaliation that wouldn't recoil on myself.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢一种不会牵累到我自己的报复.

sentences.en: Industry rivalry and the threat of retaliation.
sentences.cn: 同行业竞争和报复的威胁。

sentences.en: Like retaliation tariff, preferential tariff is used as a weapon in international relations.
sentences.cn: 与报复性关税一样, 特惠关税在国际关系中也被当成一种武器使用.

sentences.en: Our response involves far more than instant retaliation and isolated strikes.
sentences.cn: 我们的反应远不止一时的报复,也不仅仅是空袭.

sentences.en: Police said they believed the attack was in retaliation for the death of the drug trafficker.
sentences.cn: 警察说他们认为这次袭击是针对那个毒犯的死实施的报复。

sentences.en: Such measures threaten to provoke escalating retaliation and a full - blown trade war.
sentences.cn: 这些措施将招致更大规模的贸易报复措施,甚至全面的贸易战.

sentences.en: The alternative is massive retaliation by missiles aimed at the enemy's cities.
sentences.cn: 一种选择是用导弹对准敌人所在的城市大规模反击.

sentences.en: The armed forces were on high alert to guard against any retaliation.
sentences.cn: 武装部队保持高度戒备，以防发生任何报复行动。

sentences.en: The prescribed punishment often took the form of exact retaliation.
sentences.cn: 它所规定的惩罚多采用报复的形式.

sentences.en: The residents and witnesses all spoke on condition of anonymity for fear of retaliation.
sentences.cn: 传播短信的居民和目击者出于害怕报复的考虑均采用匿名。

sentences.en: The two women said they suffered retaliation when they complained.
sentences.cn: 这两位妇女表示,她们提出抱怨时遭到了打击报复.

sentences.en: There were no injuries or damage, but the attack raised the prospect of further Israeli retaliation.
sentences.cn: 这次袭击没有造成伤亡或者破坏，但是却使以色列有可能进一步报复。
他们决定采取报复行动.

trans.tran_en: action against someone who has done something bad to you
